data

Class TaskData

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.TaskData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITaskData, ITaskDataFileInputOutput, ITaskDataUndo

    public class TaskData
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITaskData, ITaskDataFileInputOutput, ITaskDataUndo
    Program memory for the tasks in the program.
    It is the job of TaskData to ensure that the absolute index of each task
    remains the same even after deletion / addition of tasks.

      Call this whenever a save is successful so that TaskData knows it no longer has any unsaved changes.

      • retrieveUndoSnapshot

        public UndoSnapshot retrieveUndoSnapshot()
        Retrieves the undo snapshot holding the previous state of all tasks that were changed in the last action.
        The undo snapshot is cleared (deleted) when this method is called.
        Specified by:
        retrieveUndoSnapshot in interface ITaskDataUndo
        Returns:
        an UndoSnapshot holding the previous state of TaskData.
